name: Laragit
description: A Laravel interface for managing Github notifications.

APP_KEY.description: A secret key for Laravel internal use.You can get it at http://randomkeygen.com/ in the codeigniter section

GITHUB_ID.description: Your Github APP ID. You can register your application to get it at https://github.com/settings/applications/new

GITHUB_SECRET.description: Your Github APP secret. You can register your application to get it at https://github.com/settings/applications/new

GITHUB_CALLBACK.description: Your Github callback. This sould also be set at your application. It is [app-name].herokuapp.com/callback
